reviews.review_msg: Dry lectures, the exam was essentially memorizing all the content on all of his lecture slides. If you get incompetent teammates you are screwed because you gotta do everything yourself.

Mark is a great speaker, knowledgeable, and a very fair marker. The class didn't cover nearly as much sound design/mixing as I expected (a lot is theory) but he makes the lecs interesting. Assignments are easy for the most part. Unlike most SIAT courses, you don't need to "exceed expectations" and overwork yourself to get an A.
